Try.description: Put the caret before any word. Press <action="EditorNextWordWithSelection"> to move caret to the next word with selection.
Press <action="EditorSelectWord"> to extend selection to the next code block.
Try increase your selection with <action="EditorSelectWord"> until your file will be selected.
<action="EditorUnSelectWord"> shrinks selection. Try to press it.
